templates.name: First Email Template
templates.subject: First Email Template
templates.body:
This is an example of a template. 

Templates can be plain text and also include what we call "Dynamic Fields" 

For example, if your email is a shipping update. You can include the id, tracking number, estimated delivery date, and customer name. 

These are fields which change from email to email. 

Example: 

Hello {@text: What is the name of the user?},

Your package has been shipped and should arrive on: {@date: When will the package be delivered?}.

Here is your tacking number: {@text: What is the tracking number?}

Best,
Company

fields.id: {@text: What is the name of the user?}
fields.label: What is the name of the user?

fields.id: {@date: When will the package be delivered?}
fields.label: When will the package be delivered?
